instructions: 1. Copy your exercises from the sandbox UI into the 'exercises' array below
2. Make sure each exercise has all required fields
3. Save this file and run: npm run import-exercises -- manual-exercises-YYYY-MM-DD.json

exercises.title: Example: Self-Reflection Exercise
exercises.description: A sample exercise to show the format
exercises.question: What are three things you learned about yourself today?
exercises.instructions: Take 5-10 minutes to reflect on your day. Write down specific examples and insights.

exercises.title: Example: Media OR Exercise
exercises.description: Example showing OR logic - user needs either image OR video
exercises.question: Share a moment from your day through media
exercises.instructions: Choose to either upload a photo OR record a short video that captures something meaningful from your day.
exercises.textPrompt: Optional: Add a caption or description
